message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Can you meet me there?
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $165?
I appreciate the compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $155. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob! How about we meet at $160?
I'm close to the price you mentioned, but I was thinking more along the lines of $157.50. Can you meet me there?
I'm really close to your offer, Bob! How about we meet at $159?
I'm close to the price you mentioned, but I was thinking more along the lines of $158. Can you meet me there?
I'm really close to your offer, Bob! How about we meet at $159.5?
